description: Options for the Fastify micropub-endpoint plugin
title: Micropub Endpoint Options

createPost.title: Create post
createPost.description: [Creates](https://micropub.spec.indieweb.org/#create) a post on the Micropub server.

parameters.title: JF2
parameters.description: Micropub post from requests sent with any one of these values of `Content-Type`: `application/json`, `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`, `multipart/form-data`.

anyOf.title: JF2 (json)
anyOf.description: Micropub post from requests sent with `Content-Type: application/json`.

anyOf.title: Audio
anyOf.description: URL of an audio file.

anyOf.title: Author
anyOf.description: Author of a post (to use in h-entry, h-recipe).

anyOf.title: microformats2 h-card
anyOf.description: h-card is a simple, open format for publishing people and organisations on the web. h-card is often used on home pages and individual blog posts.

altitude.title: Altitude
altitude.description: Distance in metres from the nominal sea level along the tangent of the earth’s curve, i.e. the geoid height.

anniversary.title: Date
anniversary.description: Date formatted according to ISO 8601 or RFC 3339.

anyOf.title: Date (RFC 3339)
anyOf.description: Date formatted according to RFC 3339.

anyOf.title: Date with time zone (RFC 3339)
anyOf.description: Date-time formatted according to RFC 3339 (time-zone is mandatory).

anyOf.title: Full date-time string (ISO 8601)
anyOf.description: Represents a full date-time string in the ISO 8601 format (time zone is optional).

bday.title: Date
bday.description: Date formatted according to ISO 8601 or RFC 3339.

anyOf.title: Date (RFC 3339)
anyOf.description: Date formatted according to RFC 3339.

anyOf.title: Date with time zone (RFC 3339)
anyOf.description: Date-time formatted according to RFC 3339 (time-zone is mandatory).

anyOf.title: Full date-time string (ISO 8601)
anyOf.description: Represents a full date-time string in the ISO 8601 format (time zone is optional).

key.description: cryptographic public key e.g. SSH or GPG

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Coordinate that specifies the north–south position of a point on the surface of the Earth, in decimal degrees.

logo.description: a logo representing the person or organization (e.g. a face icon)

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Coordinate that specifies the east–west position of a point on the surface of the Earth, in decimal degrees.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the entry, event, item, product, etc (to use in h-entry, h-event, h-item, h-product, h-recipe, h-review, h-review-aggregate).

post-office-box.description: post office box description if any

uid.title: UID
uid.description: URL/URI that uniquely/canonically identifies the object).

bookmark-of.title: URL
bookmark-of.description: URL of the card, entry, event, etc.

anyOf.title: Category
anyOf.description: Category or categories.

anyOf.title: Content
anyOf.description: Some plain text content.

html.title: Content (HTML)
html.description: The text/html version of the containing object. `html` MUST be a single string value only.

text.title: Content (plain text)
text.description: The text/plain version of the containing object. `text` MUST be a single string value only.

date.title: Date
date.description: Date formatted according to ISO 8601 or RFC 3339.

anyOf.title: Date (RFC 3339)
anyOf.description: Date formatted according to RFC 3339.

anyOf.title: Date with time zone (RFC 3339)
anyOf.description: Date-time formatted according to RFC 3339 (time-zone is mandatory).

anyOf.title: Full date-time string (ISO 8601)
anyOf.description: Represents a full date-time string in the ISO 8601 format (time zone is optional).

end.title: Date
end.description: Date formatted according to ISO 8601 or RFC 3339.

anyOf.title: Date (RFC 3339)
anyOf.description: Date formatted according to RFC 3339.

anyOf.title: Date with time zone (RFC 3339)
anyOf.description: Date-time formatted according to RFC 3339 (time-zone is mandatory).

anyOf.title: Full date-time string (ISO 8601)
anyOf.description: Represents a full date-time string in the ISO 8601 format (time zone is optional).

in-reply-to.title: URL
in-reply-to.description: URL of the card, entry, event, etc.

like-of.title: URL
like-of.description: URL of the card, entry, event, etc.

anyOf.description: Location in plain text.

anyOf.title: Geo URI
anyOf.description: The geo URI scheme is a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) scheme defined by the Internet Engineering Task Force's RFC 5870.

anyOf.title: microformats2 h-adr
anyOf.description: h-adr is a simple, open format for publishing structured locations such as addresses, physical and/or postal.

altitude.title: Altitude
altitude.description: Distance in metres from the nominal sea level along the tangent of the earth’s curve, i.e. the geoid height.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Coordinate that specifies the north–south position of a point on the surface of the Earth, in decimal degrees.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Coordinate that specifies the east–west position of a point on the surface of the Earth, in decimal degrees.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the entry, event, item, product, etc (to use in h-entry, h-event, h-item, h-product, h-recipe, h-review, h-review-aggregate).

anyOf.title: Publication
anyOf.description: Used for citing articles, books, etc (used in h-cite).

anyOf.title: URL
anyOf.description: URL of the card, entry, event, etc.

anyOf.title: microformats2 h-cite
anyOf.description: h-cite is a simple, open format for publishing citations and references to online and other publications.

examples.author: Isaac Newton
examples.name: The Correspondence of Isaac Newton: Volume 5
examples.content: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants.

repost-of.title: URL
repost-of.description: URL of the card, entry, event, etc.

rsvp.title: RSVP
rsvp.description: An RSVP is a reply to an event that says whether the sender is attending, is not attending, might attend, or is merely interested.

start.title: Date
start.description: Date formatted according to ISO 8601 or RFC 3339.

anyOf.title: Date (RFC 3339)
anyOf.description: Date formatted according to RFC 3339.

anyOf.title: Date with time zone (RFC 3339)
anyOf.description: Date-time formatted according to RFC 3339 (time-zone is mandatory).

anyOf.title: Full date-time string (ISO 8601)
anyOf.description: Represents a full date-time string in the ISO 8601 format (time zone is optional).

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Summary of an entry (to use in h-entry, h-recipe, h-resume).

syndication.title: Syndication
syndication.description: URL(s) of syndicated copies of this post. The property equivalent of rel-syndication.

anyOf.title: Syndication target
anyOf.description: URL where the content was syndicated to.

items.title: Syndication target
items.description: URL where the content was syndicated to.

anyOf.title: URL
anyOf.description: URL of the card, entry, event, etc.

items.title: URL
items.description: URL of the card, entry, event, etc.

anyOf.title: Video
anyOf.description: URL of a video file.

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: The OAuth Bearer token authenticating the request (the access token may be sent in an HTTP Authorization header or this form parameter).

action.title: Action
action.description: Action to perform on the object (updates are not supported in the form-encoded syntax).

mp-destination.title: Destination
mp-destination.description: Specify a destination to create a new post on a web site other than the default.

mp-limit.title: Limit
mp-limit.description: Adds the parameter limit to any query to limit the number of returned results.

mp-post-status.title: Post status
mp-post-status.description: Allows a Micropub client to set the status of a post.

mp-slug.title: Slug
mp-slug.description: Allows a Micropub client to suggest a slug to the Micropub endpoint.

anyOf.title: Syndication target
anyOf.description: URL where the content will be syndicated to.

items.title: Syndication target
items.description: URL where the content will be syndicated to.

post-status.title: Post status
post-status.description: Allows a Micropub client to set the status of a post.

published.description: Date formatted according to ISO 8601 or RFC 3339.

visibility.description: Adds a property for use in Micropub requests called visibility that informs a server whether a post should be public, private or unlisted.

jf2ToLocation.title: JF2 to store/website location
jf2ToLocation.description: Maps a JF2 object to a location in the store and a URL published on (or that it will be published to) the user's website.
